Description: Wooden kohl-tube in the form of a palm column, with traces of blue and red pigment.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 May-Oct, Abbaye Saint-Gerard De Brogne, Le Roman de la momie 2012 July -September, Tokyo, Mori museum, The Book of the Dead: Journey Through the Afterlife 2012, October - November, Fukuoka Museum of Art, The Book of the Dead 2013, May - September, Perth, Western Australian Museum, The Book of the Dead
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Robert Ludwig Mond
